name: AffirmSaver
description:
Your candy friends hear that you've been having a tough time of things and want to help! Spend some time hearing words of affirmation from Starlight Mint and her friends in the meadow, listening to calming music and watching puff blossoms blow away in the wind.

Controls: Sit back, relax, enjoy.
(also, you can click somewhere on the screen to ask Starlight Mint to go there)

Music:

"Dream Culture" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
